statusCode.description: HTTP-style status code representing the answer. 200 if the document contains a job posting; 400 if the document does not contain a job posting or you cannot recognize the job from the document; 500 if your internal error or you cannot open the document.

status.description: Text explanation for statusCode, e.g., 'OK', 'Bad Request', 'Internal Server Error' etc.

jobTitle.description: Job title from the document or 'not available'

jobDescription.description: Short description of the job from the document or 'not available'

keywords.description: Array of keyword strings for the job posting from the document

responsibilities.description: Optional/Main job responsibilities as array of strings

requirements.description: Optional/Main job requirements as array of strings
